src/SpecBit_examples.cpp
src/SpecBit_tests.cpp
)

set(header_files
include/external_examples.hpp

include/model_files_and_boxes.hpp
include/MSSMSpec.hpp

include/SpecBit_tests.hpp

add_gambit_library(SpecBit OPTION OBJECT SOURCES ${source_files} HEADERS ${header_files})
